topic.title: Where to watch Mayweather vs McGregor live and for free?
topic.body: Does someone know a reliable streaming site to watch this fight? Maybe it's possible to "stream" it over zeronet?

1_1QKrQkPmeoDEqLJB3uqCzbgScjbFsVoEe2.body: I will probably just torrent it the next day and try to avoid spoilers. I will surely not pay $99.95 for a 10 sec freakshow, lol.
